values

mapper.update:
update track_info
track_info.create_time = #{createTime},
track_info.is_delete = #{isDelete},
track_info.operator = #{operator},
track_info.track_code = #{trackCode},
track_info.track_division_id = #{trackDivisionId},
track_info.track_type = #{trackType},
track_info.update_time = #{updateTime}
track_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select track_info.create_time, track_info.id, track_info.is_delete, track_info.operator, track_info.track_code, track_info.track_division_id, track_info.track_type, track_info.update_time form track_info
track_info.id = #{id}
